There=A0is no need for spies on this board, when you made it you made it vi=
ewable to the world. Dont have to be a member to=A0 read whats posted here =
in archives (which is packed full of all sorts of information including thi=
s subject), only have to be a member to add to the discussions. Nobody has =
to forward him anything he can take the time to read for himself. 
=A0
Mist=
y
=A0

ggin' spies
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, June 4, 2009, 1:01 =
PM









Frank,
=A0
=A0Someone,=A0and=A0I think I know who, is forwardin=
g posts. If I find out=A0for sure who it is, I'll recommend you get banned.=
=A0 Obviously this idiot knows what he's guilty of, and assumes=A0I meant h=
im. Maybe this person should just be banned anyway. 
=A0
=A0Frank-S
=A0
=A0=

=A0
"Do me a favor, stop letting Chris Moon put=A0his words=A0into=A0your =
mouth. The things you accused who we all know is me in your post #14829 and=
 #14832 are the same pathetic things moon said when I exposed him on his ow=
n radio show a while back.
=A0
Frank don't lower yourself to his level and =
don't let him manipulate you.
=A0
Stop letting him talk you into slandering=
 other people with unsubstantiated claims. Frank I am=A0not saying this=A0o=
ut of anger but he is pushing you to do things because he is not man enough=
 to do them himself!
=A0
Tell=A0him that I will produce the coinciding raw =
file for any posted file I have, see if he can do the same. Let this be the=
 last time I have to write you I am asking politely..
=A0
All is possible, =
nothing is probable"
